title: Monetary Policy and Risk Management at a Time of Low Inflation and Low Unemployment
content: Inflation(t) =  –B Slack(t) + C Inflation(t-1) + Other(t)  where Inflation = core inflation;  Slack = unemployment minus the natural rate;   Other = unspecified factors including a regression error and constant term;   t, t-1 = years of the observations.      Figure 4.  Simple Phillips Curve Relation
